content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.42 > Section 74.42.060 74.42.058 << 74.42.060 >> 74.42.070 PDF RCW 74.42.060 Management of residents' financial affairs. The facility shall allow a resident or the resident's guardian to manage the resident's financial affairs. The facility may assist a resident in the management of his or her financial affairs if the resident requests assistance in writing and the facility complies with the recordkeeping requirements of RCW 74.42.130 and the provisions of *chapter . . . (Senate Bill No. 2335), Laws of 1979. [ 1979 ex.s. c 211 s 6 .] NOTES: *Reviser's note: Senate Bill No. 2335 was not enacted during the 1979 legislative sessions. A similar bill was enacted in 1980 and became 1980 c 177, which is codified primarily in chapter 74.46 RCW.
